Package oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui

This package is for Global Search UI classes.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
InteractiveSearchResult The parts of a Search Result that the user interacts with in the UI and may interact with.
SearchResult A Search Result - the highest level concept in Global Search.
SearchUtils.VisitOperation  
 

Class Summary
AbstractSearchableFactory An abstract Factory for creating specific searchable implementations.
AbstractSearchResult An abstract base class for Search Results.
AdvancedSearchAttribute An advanced search attribute.
BackgroundSearchRunnable A runnable for running background searches to extend the search results.
BaseRecentSearch A Recent Search.
BaseSavedSearch A Saved Search.
GlobalSearchDateRange A date range used as a selection in the last update date filters.
GlobalSearchFacet  
GlobalSearchFacetItem An immutable Java Bean representing a Facet Item.
GlobalSearchSearchableObject An immutable Java Bean representing a Searchable Object.
IconUtils Icon utilities.
PersistentSearchFilter An immutable simple bean class that encapsulates a search filter consisting of a type, label, value and displayValue.
ResultComparator A comparator to compare 2 SearchResultItems.
SearchCategory A Search Category, also called a Datasource group.
SearchError Global Search specific Search error from the fnd_messages table.
SearchResultCM A collectionModel based off a SearchResult.
SearchResultItem A single search result item.
SearchResultOrder  
SearchUtils Generic utilities for Global Search.
WindowSize Simple bean to store a window dimension.
 

Enum Summary
GlobalSearchDateRange.RangeType Type of Date to use in a date range.
PersistentSearchFilter.FilterType Type of filter.
 

Package oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.globalSearch.ui Description

This package is for Global Search UI classes.
